abstract: Cablevision Systems reports third-quarter profit of $39.3 million, compared with profit of $68.4 million in year-ago quarter; revenue was $1.67 billion, up 8 percent.
snippet: Earnings missed estimates, hurt by a weak economy, high programming costs and competition from phone companies that offer television services.
lead_paragraph: Earnings missed estimates, hurt by a weak economy, high programming costs and competition from phone companies that offer television services.

headline.main: Cablevision Struggles, and Its Shares Fall 12.5%
headline.print_headline: Cablevision Struggles, and Its Shares Fall 12.5%
headline.seo: Cablevision Struggles, and Its Shares Fall 12.5%
